name: Tsuki to Taiyou no Raksharuki 2: Sabaku no Kuni no Ohime-sama
storyline:
Karim, who was helping his brother Ramuru's factory in the western city of Al-Shams, was suddenly invited to the palace by King Aldo of the desert kingdom Janna.
The city of Janna, which I visited for the first time in a year.
Reunited with the merchant Tahim and the bar's daughter Nia, Karim goes to the perfume kingdom "Charmira" in the western frontier and enjoys the perfume "Desert Rose", which is said to give eternal beauty. You are ordered to get it.
summary: As a trader, Karim trades while moving east, west, south, and north through the desert. One day, a year after he got the legendary "magic lamp" with beautiful dancers.
